titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the parish-church of St. Chad's in Shrewsbury, March 5, 1694/5 being the funeral day of our most gracious sovereign Queen Mary / by Thomas Dawes.
titleStmt.author: Dawes, Thomas, 1652?-1715.
